member.name: M:DataSetLinqOperators.ToDataTable``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Creates a that contains the data from a source sequence.
member.remarks: The initial schema of the DataTable is based on schema of the type T. All public property and fields are turned into DataColumns. If the source sequence contains a sub-type of T, the table is automatically expanded for any addition public properties or fields.

member.summary: Loads the data from a source sequence into an existing .
member.remarks: The schema of must be consistent with the schema of the type T (all public property and fields are mapped to DataColumns). If the source sequence contains a sub-type of T, the table is automatically expanded for any addition public properties or fields.
